name: Bomb Digging
description:
Drop bombs to dig through the mines and collect treasure. Post your high score in the comments! 

Controls

  • Z: Jump.
  • X: Drop a bomb. Maximum two active at the same time.
  • Arrow keys to move 

Terrain

Brown-ish blocks can be blown up for items. Dark and gray ones are too hard.

You can push around your own bombs and gray blocks.

Items

  • Invincibility: Can't be harmed by bombs nor enemies!
  • Infinite bombs: Bomb limit is removed, for a limited time.
  • Halt time: The level does not increase (unless you go down).

Credits

  • Art - FelkyMike
  • Programming - tete

Made for Ludum Dare 50
